p: where M is the mitigation and E base and E strategy are the net emissions in the baseline scenario and the mitigation scenario, respectively. In both scenarios, net emissions included three componentsâ€”the forest ecosystem emissions, the HWP emissions including bioenergy, and emissions as a result of displacement. Displacement impacts for products included the emissions associated with the extraction and transportation of raw materials and the manufacturing of products, based on aggregated studies in the literature (Smyth et al. 2016).
